meanings.definition: A building or structure containing pumps.
meanings.sent1: The pumphouses in the city supply water to all the buildings.
meanings.sent2: The workers were busy repairing the pumphouses near the river.
meanings.sent3: The pumphouses decided to have a race to see who could pump water the fastest.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a network of interconnected pumphouses, always ready to spring into action.
meanings.sent5: The pumphouses hummed with the sound of machinery, echoing through the empty streets.

meanings.sent1: We passed by several pumphouses on our way to the countryside.
meanings.sent2: The town had two pumphouses, one for clean water and one for irrigation.
meanings.sent3: The pumphouses gathered for a group photo, each one looking identical to the others.
meanings.sent4: His ideas flowed like a river, branching out from multiple pumphouses of creativity.
meanings.sent5: The pumphouses stood tall against the backdrop of the setting sun, a symbol of utility and strength.
